name: Mouthsmadegood.com
overview:
Mouthsmadegood.com provides information and advice for cancer therapy patients to help them prevent and treat oral mucositis.

Oral mucositis is a common and often debilitating complication of cancer treatment, causing the surface that lines the mouth and tongue to become red, swollen and covered in ulcers. But there is no need to accept oral mucositis as an inevitable consequence of cancer therapy, as there are things that can be done to take control and the Mouthsmadegood.com website provides information and advice about how to do this.
